name: Unlikely Heroes (itch)
description:
Controls: 

  • A/D  -  Move left/right
  • W  -  Jump

A group of kids decide to take action and rid the neighborhood from all evil spirits.

Help Doodi, Maya, Reem, and Sager collect the cursed gems to destroy the evil spirits and save the neighborhood.

This is an entry for Game Zanga 7 (Game Jam)
